<http://vmturbo.com/thx-wp-licensing-compliance-audits-in-the-cloud-era?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=LicenseReport&utm_content=11202015> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, As organizations scale, planning for greater application workload demand is critical. IT cannot afford to be seen as a bottleneck to successful business growth. Ensuring that your data center is meeting the demands of your applications is critical to business growth, all the more so as your business scales into 2016! Don't be that guy (or girl) that's stalling exciting growth and opportunity. Be the person that's always got a plan for driving even more success.
<http://vmturbo.com/thx-wp-capacity-planning-and-capacity-management-thank-you?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=capacity-memory-bundle&utm_content=11_03_2015> Smarter capacity planning starts with a better understanding of the virtual environments and the interdependencies of data center entities. Download this e-Book to learn:
- The foundation for making intelligent capacity projections - Ways to assure application QoS as you provision - Resource consumption and how to think about their allocation
<http://vmturbo.com/thx-wp-capacity-planning-and-capacity-management-thank-you?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=capacity-memory-bundle&utm_content=11_03_2015> <http://vmturbo.com/thx-wp-memory-management-fundamentals-thank-you?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=capacity-memory-bundle&utm_content=11_03_2015> A lot of the time, memory is the most constrained resource in a virtualized environment. Virtualization allows us to over commit memory, which improves utilization, but can lead to other problems if not managed properly. Download this e-Book to learn about:
- Memory Ballooning - Memory Swapping
- The Limits of Traditional Techniques at Scale
<http://vmturbo.com/thx-wp-memory-management-fundamentals-thank-you?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=capacity-memory-bundle&utm_content=11_03_2015>
